title: (x) Numbers with a No - Crash Numbering {Marc O}
content:
I’m trying to find a font like the one below. I don’t want to spend $129 on the H&F version. It seems like I have seen this somewhere else, but I can’t for the life of me remember where. Thanks for any help you can give me and sorry for the small size. I don’t need this exact font, just something similar.

Sharon

 ![](http://web.archive.org/web/20080828002911im_/http:/www.typophile.com/files/numbers_5963.jpg)

 [‹ (x) "Roctakon" stencil face - Cargo {Yves}](http://web.archive.org/web/20080828002911/http:/www.typophile.com/node/34094 "Go to previous forum topic") [Ben Bridge logo Script ›](http://web.archive.org/web/20080828002911/http:/www.typophile.com/node/35695 "Go to next forum topic")
author: Sharon Van Lieu
